question: Which of the following ruler granted permission to Lal Vijaya to build a huge monastery for the Tapagachcha sect of Jains?
explanation: Aurangzeb granted inam lands free of taxes to many Jains, As a result of which Jain sources speak very highly of Aurangzeb. Lal Vijaya, a Jain monk was also granted permission to build a huge monastery for the Tapagachcha sect of Jains.
